attributes.action: Make national awareness concerning deadly silica contaminated cannabis, or so called grit weed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
contaminated cannabis flooding the uk which has been contaminated with dealdy microscopical silica. thousands of uk citizens unknown to the government are breathing deadly particulates into their lungs which will cause silicosis.

If people are made aware of this dire situation then the irreversable damage that is being caused can be put to a stop.

An amnesty for contaminated cannabis to be sent to be tested would also be highly advisable if the true scale of this problem is currentley of no concern.

 This is an impending pandemic which will happen and if the matter is not adressed soon, then who will be to blame?
